  <meta content="50.167958;-97.133185" name="geo.position"/>
  <meta content="Rockwood Rural Municipality, Manitoba, Canada" name="geo.placename"/>
  <meta content="ca-mb" name="geo.region"/>
  <meta content="g-kbkq8aoj666WNgcIdHUB-zhAvS2a-xpYPHPo1soh0" name="google-site-verification"/>
  <meta content="g-kbkq8aoj666WNgcIdHUB-zhAvS2a-xpYPHPo1soh0" name="google-site-verification"/>
  <link href="http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_Uz5YdrBgjIw/TQRoW7LqUwI/AAAAAAAAA7c/klMtgszxJF8/s1600/PBB+fevicon.PNG" rel="icon"/>
  <link href="http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_Uz5YdrBgjIw/TQRoW7LqUwI/AAAAAAAAA7c/klMtgszxJF8/s1600/PBB+fevicon.PNG" rel="icon"/>
  <style>
   #mainbottomleft, #mainbottomright {
display:none; 
margin:0;
padding:0;
border:0;
}
.post-body a {
 color: #D83F1D;
 text-decoration:none;
}
.post img {
padding:0px;
height: auto;
}

}

display:inline;
}

}

text-transform: none;
}

padding: 20px;

text-align: left;
}

}

}

}

}

   var a="indexOf",b="&amp;m=1",e="(^|&amp;)m=",f="?",g="?m=1";function h(){var c=window.location.href,d=c.split(f);switch(d.length){case 1:return c+g;case 2:return 0&lt;=d[1].search(e)?null:c+b;default:return null}}var k=navigator.userAgent;if(-1!=k[a]("Mobile")&amp;&amp;-1!=k[a]("WebKit")&amp;&amp;-1==k[a]("iPad")||-1!=k[a]("Opera Mini")||-1!=k[a]("IEMobile")){var l=h();l&amp;&amp;window.location.replace(l)};

         <div class="widget Blog" id="Blog1">
          <div class="blog-posts hfeed">
           <span class="noprint">
            <p class="breadcrumbs">
             <span class="post-labels">
              <a href="http://www.problogbooster.com/" rel="tag">
               Home
              </a>
              
              <a href="http://www.problogbooster.com/search/label/Firefox" rel="tag">
               Firefox
              </a>
              
              <a href="http://www.problogbooster.com/search/label/How%20to" rel="tag">
               How to
              </a>
              
              <a href="http://www.problogbooster.com/search/label/Internet" rel="tag">
               Internet
              </a>
              
              <span>
               Make Firefox Super Fast : AIO : ProBlogBooster
              </span>
             </span>
            </p>
           </span>
           <div class="post hentry uncustomized-post-template">
            <a name="3671158320605548654">
            </a>
            <div id="commentbox">
             <h1 class="post-title entry-title">
              Make Firefox Super Fast : AIO : ProBlogBooster
             </h1>
            </div>
            <div class="post-header-line-1">
             <div style="clear: both;">
             </div>
             <br/>
             <span class="noprint">
              <div align="middle">
               <span class="noprint">
                <div align="middle">
                 <script type="text/javascript">
                  &lt;!--
google_ad_client = "ca-pub-1410264604776114";
/* 468x60-inbtweenpost-ads */
google_ad_slot = "8730533289";
google_ad_width = 468;
google_ad_height = 60;
//--&gt;
                 </script>
                 <script src="//pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/show_ads.js" type="text/javascript">
                 </script>
                </div>
               </span>
              </div>
             </span>
             <div style="clear: both;">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="post-body entry-content">
             <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Georgia;">
              <t>
               H
              </t>
              ere is all in one(
              <span style="font-weight: bold;">
               AIO
              </span>
              ) trick for all types of versions of Firefox, to make it superfast than before by any other trick.
             </div>
             <p style="font-family: Georgia;">
              This is totally
              <span style="font-weight: bold;">
               Tested OK
              </span>
              boost, and proved on all version of Firefox even up to 3.6.*.
              <br/>
              <br/>
              This boostrick not only make the Firefox speedy but also it retain RAM memory used. This makes it more stabilize.
              <a href="http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_Uz5YdrBgjIw/S7IIqB6VAfI/AAAAAAAAA2M/I3ojZZmaWOw/s1600/Make+Firefox+Super+Fast++AIO++ProBlogBooster.JPG" onblur="try {parent.deselectBloggerImageGracefully();} catch(e) {}">
              </a>
             </p>
             <p style="font-family: Georgia;">
              <img align="middle" alt="Fast firefox problogbooster" border="0px" height="368" src="http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_Uz5YdrBgjIw/TSHv3ZhnCEI/AAAAAAAABDg/8jWq6OH9Mq4/s1600/Make%2BFirefox%2BSuper%2BFaster-AIO%2BProBlogBooster.PNG" title="Fast firefox problogbooster" width="575"/>
              <br/>
              <a name="more">
              </a>
             </p>
             <span style="font-weight: bold; font-family: Georgia;">
             </span>
             <a name="more" style="font-family: Georgia;">
             </a>
             <p style="font-family: Georgia;">
             </p>
             <div class="ciphercode2" style="font-family: Georgia;">
              <span style="font-weight: bold;">
               +Boost
              </span>
              <br/>
              1. This method provides booster to the Firefox workflow.
              <br/>
              <br/>
              2. Improves the loading of WebPages.
              <br/>
              <br/>
              3. Removes the heavy load on Firefox.
              <br/>
              <br/>
              4. Reduce memory requirement by using minimum part of RAM.
              <br/>
              <br/>
             </div>
             <span style="font-family: Georgia;">
              To get all these benefits, you have to just follow these steps properly.
             </span>
             <span style="font-size: 10pt; font-style: italic;">
              <span style="font-family: Georgia; font-size: 10pt;">
               [I said
              </span>
              <span style="font-weight: bold; font-family: Georgia; font-size: 10pt;">
               PROPERLY!!!
              </span>
              ]
             </span>
             <br style="font-family: Georgia;"/>
             <span style="font-family: Georgia;">
              Before read all the following steps first you have to backup the setting as well as the profile of the Firefox. In case you don't know how to backup the Firefox, just read this topic:
             </span>
             <a href="http://problogbooster.blogspot.com/2010/04/backup-firefox-simplest-method-ever.html" style="font-family: Georgia;">
              Backup Firefox: Simplest Method Ever
             </a>
             <span style="font-family: Georgia;">
              .
             </span>
             <br style="font-family: Georgia;"/>
             <span style="font-family: Georgia;">
              Now go step by step...
             </span>
             <br style="font-family: Georgia;"/>
             <p style="font-family: Georgia;">
             </p>
             <div style="font-family: Georgia;">
              <span style="font-weight: bold;">
               Open Configuration Tab in Firefox:
               <br/>
              </span>
              1. Open Firefox and type in address bar
              <br/>
              <span style="font-weight: bold;">
               about:config
              </span>
              <br/>
              Press enter.
              <br/>
              2. Now the Firefox shows the warning as:
              <br/>
             </div>
             <div style="font-family: Georgia;">
              <a href="http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_Uz5YdrBgjIw/S7HMFGwT3PI/AAAAAAAAA18/xf-1ni_ec34/s1600/warning-Optimized-1.jpg" onblur="try {parent.deselectBloggerImageGracefully();} catch(e) {}">
               <img alt="" border="0" id="BLOGGER_PHOTO_ID_5454365011807034610" src="http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_Uz5YdrBgjIw/S7HMFGwT3PI/AAAAAAAAA18/xf-1ni_ec34/s400/warning-Optimized-1.jpg" style="display: block; margin: 0px auto 10px; width: 400px; cursor: pointer; height: 190px; text-align: center;"/>
              </a>
             </div>
             <div style="font-family: Georgia;">
              3. Click on
              <span style="font-weight: bold;">
               I'll be careful, I promise.
              </span>
             </div>
             <div style="font-family: Georgia;">
             </div>
             <div style="font-family: Georgia;">
              <span style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 12pt;">
               Boost No.1: BROWSER HISTORY
              </span>
             </div>
             <blockquote style="font-family: Georgia;">
              <div>
               <span style="font-weight: bold;">
               </span>
               In the new address bar, means in tab window in front of
               <span style="font-weight: bold;">
                filter;
               </span>
              </div>
              <div>
               <span style="font-weight: bold;">
               </span>
               type
               <span style="font-weight: bold;">
                browser.sessionhistory.max_entries
               </span>
              </div>
              <div>
               <span style="font-weight: bold;">
                <br/>
               </span>
              </div>
              <div>
               <span class="Apple-style-span" style="color: rgb(0, 0, 238);">
                <img alt="" border="0" id="BLOGGER_PHOTO_ID_5454376379611230322" src="http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_Uz5YdrBgjIw/S7HWazICMHI/AAAAAAAAA2E/Vwk9L2-hM00/s400/browser.sessionhistory.max_entriesOptimized.jpg" style="display: block; margin: 0px auto 10px; width: 396px; cursor: pointer; height: 229px; text-align: center;"/>
               </span>
              </div>
              <div>
               You will see as:
              </div>
              <div>
               <span style="font-weight: bold;">
                status :default
               </span>
              </div>
              <div>
               <span style="font-weight: bold;">
                Type: Integer
               </span>
              </div>
              <div>
               <span style="font-weight: bold;">
                Value: 50
               </span>
              </div>
              <div>
               This means that the browser keep the history up to
               <span style="font-weight: bold;">
                50
               </span>
               URLs. You have to change it to minimum value. For this double click on it. This will opens a new pop-up message with value 50, now
               <span style="font-weight: bold;">
                change 50 to 10.
               </span>
              </div>
             </blockquote>
             <div style="font-family: Georgia;">
              <span style="font-weight: bold;">
               This will reduce the load to browser
              </span>
             </div>
             <span style="font-weight: bold; font-family: Georgia;">
              <div>
               <br/>
              </div>
             </span>
             <div style="font-family: Georgia;">
              <div>
               <span style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 12pt;">
                Boost No.2: Speedup Page Loading
               </span>
              </div>
             </div>
             <blockquote style="font-family: Georgia;">
              <div>
               Now right click on white space below the address bar in tab,
              </div>
              <div>
               go to new &gt;&gt; Integer&gt;&gt;Enter Preference name as
               <span style="font-weight: bold;">
                nglayout.initialpaint.delay
               </span>
              </div>
              <div>
               Press
               <span style="font-weight: bold;">
                OK.
               </span>
              </div>
              <div>
               Enter the value
               <span style="font-weight: bold;">
                0.
               </span>
              </div>
             </blockquote>
             <div style="font-family: Georgia;">
              <span style="font-weight: bold;">
               Now Onwards the page will show as soon as it gets downloaded.
               <br/>
              </span>
             </div>
             <div style="font-family: Georgia;">
              <span style="font-weight: bold;">
              </span>
             </div>
             <div style="font-family: Georgia;">
              <span style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 12pt;">
              </span>
             </div>
             <div style="font-family: Georgia;">
              <span style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 12pt;">
              </span>
             </div>
             <br style="font-family: Georgia;"/>
             <div style="font-family: Georgia;">
              <span style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 12pt;">
               Boost No.3: Define small amount of memory to Firefox
              </span>
             </div>
             <blockquote style="font-family: Georgia;">
              <div>
               a. Similarly type
               <span class="Apple-style-span" style="font-weight: bold;">
                <span style="font-weight: bold;">
                 browser.cache.memory.enable
                </span>
                in same address bar in tab.
               </span>
              </div>
              <div>
               <span style="font-weight: bold;">
                <span class="Apple-style-span" style="font-weight: normal;">
                 Set the value to
                </span>
                True
                <span class="Apple-style-span" style="font-weight: normal;">
                 .
                 <span style="font-style: italic; font-size: 10pt;">
                  (Most of the time it is False)
                 </span>
                </span>
               </span>
              </div>
              <span class="Apple-style-span" style="font-weight: bold;">
               <div>
                <br/>
               </div>
              </span>
              <div>
               <span class="Apple-style-span" style="font-weight: bold;">
                b.Now right click on white space below the address bar in tab, go to new &gt;&gt; Integer&gt;&gt;enter preference name as
                <span style="font-weight: bold;">
                 browser.cache.memory.capacity,
                </span>
                press
                <span style="font-weight: bold;">
                 OK.
                </span>
               </span>
              </div>
              <div>
               Now put the value according following table.
              </div>
              <div align="center">
               <table align="center" border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" width="400">
                <tbody>
                 <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="200">
                   <p align="center">
                    <span style="font-weight: bold; color: rgb(187, 61, 0);">
                     YOUR RAM
                    </span>
                   </p>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="198">
                   <p align="center">
                    <span style="font-weight: bold; color: rgb(187, 61, 0);">
                     Value
                    </span>
                   </p>
                  </td>
                 </tr>
                 <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="200">
                   <p align="center">
                    128MB
                   </p>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="198">
                   <p align="center">
                    2048
                   </p>
                  </td>
                 </tr>
                 <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="200">
                   <p align="center">
                    256MB
                   </p>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="198">
                   <p align="center">
                    4096
                   </p>
                  </td>
                 </tr>
                 <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="200">
                   <p align="center">
                    512MB
                   </p>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="198">
                   <p align="center">
                    8192
                   </p>
                  </td>
                 </tr>
                 <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="200">
                   <p align="center">
                    1024MB=1GB
                   </p>
                   <p align="center">
                    &amp; above all RAMs
                   </p>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="198">
                   <p align="center">
                    12288
                   </p>
                  </td>
                 </tr>
                </tbody>
               </table>
              </div>
             </blockquote>
             <div style="font-family: Georgia;">
              <span style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 12pt;">
               Boost No.4:
               <span class="Apple-style-span" style="font-weight: bold;">
                Set the cache capacity for Firefox
               </span>
              </span>
             </div>
             <blockquote style="font-family: Georgia;">
              <div>
               Generally the Firefox wants more ram to work as well as for cache purpose, and we have to reduce this usage of extra memory for caching the data.
              </div>
              <div>
               Type
               <span style="font-weight: bold;">
                browser.cache.disk.capacity
               </span>
              </div>
              <div>
               You will notice that
              </div>
              <div>
               <span style="font-weight: bold;">
                Value : 102400
               </span>
               (or something like this)
              </div>
              <div>
               change it to
               <span style="font-weight: bold;">
                4096.
               </span>
              </div>
             </blockquote>
             <span style="font-weight: bold; font-family: Georgia;">
              <div>
               <br/>
              </div>
             </span>
             <div style="font-family: Georgia;">
              <span style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 12pt;">
               Boost No.5: Regain Memory when Firefox is not in action
              </span>
             </div>
             <blockquote style="font-family: Georgia;">
              <div>
               Why the memory is to be keep for the Firefox when it is minimize state. To avoid this overflow of memory for Firefox,
               <br/>
               Right click on white space below the address bar in tab.
               <br/>
               Go to new &gt;&gt;
               <span style="font-weight: bold;">
                Boolean
               </span>
               &gt;&gt;enter preference name as
               <span style="font-weight: bold;">
                <span style="font-weight: bold;">
                 config.trim_on_minimize
                </span>
                ,
               </span>
               press
               <span style="font-weight: bold;">
                OK,
               </span>
               <br/>
               And set the value to
               <span style="font-weight: bold;">
                TRUE.
               </span>
              </div>
             </blockquote>
             <span style="font-weight: bold; font-family: Georgia;">
              <div>
               <br/>
              </div>
             </span>
             <div style="font-family: Georgia;">
              <span style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 12pt;">
               Boost No.6:
               <span class="Apple-style-span" style="font-weight: bold;">
                Stop Prefetching
               </span>
              </span>
             </div>
             <blockquote style="font-family: Georgia;">
              <div>
               <span style="font-weight: bold;">
                <span class="Apple-style-span" style="font-weight: normal;">
                 Now type
                </span>
                <span class="Apple-style-span" style="font-weight: bold;">
                 network.prefetch-next.
                </span>
               </span>
              </div>
              <div>
               <span class="Apple-style-span">
                You will see that its value is set to True.
                <br/>
                Change this to
               </span>
               <span class="Apple-style-span" style="font-weight: bold;">
                <span style="font-weight: bold;">
                 False
                </span>
               </span>
               <span class="Apple-style-span" style="font-style: italic; font-size: 10pt;">
                (only double click on it).
               </span>
              </div>
             </blockquote>
             <div style="font-family: Georgia;">
              <span style="font-weight: bold;">
               After all these steps, restart the Firefox.
               <br/>
              </span>
              Now you can check the speed as well as the stability of the Firefox along with the memory improvement.
             </div>
             <div style="font-family: Georgia;">
              <span style="font-weight: bold;">
              </span>
             </div>
             <br style="font-family: Georgia;"/>
             <div style="font-family: Georgia;">
              <span style="font-weight: bold;">
               Note: These tricks are also tested on
               <a href="http://problogbooster.blogspot.com/2010/01/best-browser-cometbird.html">
                CometBird
               </a>
               and Wyzo
              </span>
             </div>
             <div style="font-family: Georgia;">
              <span style="font-weight: bold;">
               <br/>
              </span>
             </div>
             <div style="clear: both;">
             </div>
            </div>
            <div style="display:none;">

              <style media="all" type="text/css">
               #related-posts {
float:center;
height:100%;
min-height:100%;
padding-left:5px;
padding-top: -12px;
}
#related-posts .widget{
padding-left:6px;
margin-bottom:10px;
}
#related-posts .widget h2, #related-posts h2{
display:none;
}
#related-posts a{
font-size:16px;
color: #555;
}
#related-posts a:hover{
color: #000;
  }

#related-posts ul {
margin:1px 0 1px 0;
text-color:#000000
display: block;
list-style-type: decimal;
-webkit-margin-before: 1em;
-webkit-margin-after: 1em;
-webkit-margin-start: 0px;
-webkit-margin-end: 0px;
}
#related-posts ul li{
list-style-type: decimal;
padding-top:0px;
padding-bottom: 5px;
display: list-item;
text-align: -webkit-match-parent;
padding-top:0px;
}

              <script type="text/javascript">
               var relatedpoststitle="Related Posts";
              </script>
              <script type="text/javascript">
               //&lt;![CDATA[
var relatedTitles=new Array();var relatedTitlesNum=0;var relatedUrls=new Array();function related_results_labels(json){for(var i=0;i&lt;json.feed.entry.length;i++){var entry=json.feed.entry[i];relatedTitles[relatedTitlesNum]=entry.title.$t;for(var k=0;k&lt;entry.link.length;k++){if(entry.link[k].rel=='alternate'){relatedUrls[relatedTitlesNum]=entry.link[k].href;relatedTitlesNum++;break}}}}function removeRelatedDuplicates(){var tmp=new Array(0);var tmp2=new Array(0);for(var i=0;i&lt;relatedUrls.length;i++){if(!contains(tmp,relatedUrls[i])){tmp.length+=1;tmp[tmp.length-1]=relatedUrls[i];tmp2.length+=1;tmp2[tmp2.length-1]=relatedTitles[i]}}relatedTitles=tmp2;relatedUrls=tmp}function contains(a,e){for(var j=0;j&lt;a.length;j++){if(a[j]==e){return true}};return false}function printRelatedLabels(currenturl){for(var i=0;i&lt;relatedUrls.length;i++){if(relatedUrls[i]==currenturl){relatedUrls.splice(i,1);relatedTitles.splice(i,1)}}var r=Math.floor((relatedTitles.length-1)*Math.random());var i=0;if(relatedTitles.length&gt;1){document.write('&lt;h2&gt;'+relatedpoststitle+'&lt;/h2&gt;')}document.write('&lt;ul&gt;');while(i&lt;relatedTitles.length&amp;&amp;i&lt;20&amp;&amp;i&lt;maxresults){document.write('&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href="'+relatedUrls[r]+'"&gt;'+relatedTitles[r]+'&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;');if(r&lt;relatedTitles.length-1){r++}else{r=0}i++}document.write('&lt;/ul&gt;');relatedUrls.splice(0,relatedUrls.length);relatedTitles.splice(0,relatedTitles.length);}
//]]&gt;
              </script>
              <div id="related-posts">
               <script src="/feeds/posts/default/-/Firefox?alt=json-in-script&amp;callback=related_results_labels&amp;max-results=6" type="text/javascript">
               </script>
               <script src="/feeds/posts/default/-/How to?alt=json-in-script&amp;callback=related_results_labels&amp;max-results=6" type="text/javascript">
               </script>
               <script src="/feeds/posts/default/-/Internet?alt=json-in-script&amp;callback=related_results_labels&amp;max-results=6" type="text/javascript">
               </script>
               <script type="text/javascript">
                var maxresults=5; removeRelatedDuplicates(); printRelatedLabels("http://www.problogbooster.com/2010/03/make-firefox-super-fast-aio.html");
               </script>
              </div>

               <script type="text/javascript">
                //&lt;![CDATA[
var element, script ;
element = document.getElementById('share-widget');
element.onmouseover = function () {
    this.onmouseover = null;
    this.parentNode.removeChild(this);
    script = document.createElement('script');
    script.async = true;
    script.src="//static.addtoany.com/menu/page.js";
    document.body.appendChild(script);
};
element = document.getElementById('google-widget');
element.onmouseover = function () {
    this.onmouseover = null;
    this.parentNode.removeChild(this);
    script = document.createElement('script');
    script.async = true;
    script.src="//static.addtoany.com/menu/page.js";
    document.body.appendChild(script);
};
element = document.getElementById('facebook-widget');
element.onmouseover = function () {
    this.onmouseover = null;
    this.parentNode.removeChild(this);
    script = document.createElement('script');
    script.async = true;
    script.src="//connect.facebook.net/en_US/all.js#xfbml=1&amp;appId=133083533456136";
    document.body.appendChild(script);
};
element = document.getElementById('twitter-widget');
element.onmouseover = function () {
    this.onmouseover = null;
    this.parentNode.removeChild(this);
    script = document.createElement('script');
    script.async = true;
    script.src = '//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js';
    document.body.appendChild(script);
};
//]]&gt;
               </script>

              <div class="afterpost">

              <script>
               function load_disqus() {
    var hidediv = document.getElementById('disqusdiv');
    hidediv.style.display = 'none';
    var disqus_shortname = 'problogbooster';
    (function () {
        var dsq = document.createElement('script');
        dsq.type = 'text/javascript';
        dsq.async = true;
        dsq.src = 'http://' + disqus_shortname + '.disqus.com/embed.js';
        (document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0] || document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0]).appendChild(dsq);
    })();
}
              </script>
              <style>
               #disqusdiv
    {
font: 18px Droid Serif;
text-transform: uppercase;
background-color: #6b635a;
color: #f9f9f9;
text-outline: #000;
font-weight: 900;
padding: 6px;
border-radius: 5px;
cursor: pointer;
width: 50%;
margin-bottom:20px;
    }
.comment-link disqus-blogger-comment-link {
display:none;}

    #disqusdiv:hover
    {
        background:#222;
        color:#fff;
    }
              </style>

               Load comments
              </div>

          <span class="noprint">
           <div class="blog-pager" id="blog-pager">

           <div class="blog-pager" id="blog-pager">
            <span id="blog-pager-newer-link">
             <a class="blog-pager-newer-link" href="http://www.problogbooster.com/2010/10/my-real-role-model-mother.html" id="Blog1_blog-pager-newer-link" title="Newer Post">

        <span class="noprint">
         <!-- page navigation start -->
         <script type="text/javascript">
          var home_page_url = location.href;
var pageCount=10;
var displayPageNum=3;
var upPageWord ='Previous';
var downPageWord ='Next';

function showpageCount(json) {
var thisUrl = home_page_url;
var htmlMap = new Array();
var thisNum = 1;
var postNum=1;
var itemCount = 0;
var fFlag = 0;
var eFlag = 0;
var html= '';
var upPageHtml ='';
var downPageHtml ='';

htmlMap[htmlMap.length]='/';
postNum++;

for(var i=pageCount-1, post; post = json.feed.entry[i]; i=i+pageCount) {
		
	var timestamp1 = post.published.$t.substring(0,19)+post.published.$t.substring(23,29);
	timestamp = encodeURIComponent(timestamp1);
	var title = post.title.$t;
			if(thisUrl.indexOf(timestamp)!=-1 ){
					thisNum = postNum;
			}
	
			postNum++;
			htmlMap[htmlMap.length] = '/search?updated-max='+timestamp+'&amp;max-results='+pageCount;
	
}

var banyaknomer = htmlMap.length;
if (json.feed.entry.length % pageCount == 0){
	var banyaknomer = htmlMap.length -1 ;
	postNum=postNum-1;
};

	
for(var p =0;p&lt; banyaknomer;p++){
	if(p&gt;=(thisNum-displayPageNum-1) &amp;&amp; p&lt;(thisNum+displayPageNum)){
		if(fFlag ==0 &amp;&amp; p == thisNum-2){
			if(thisNum==2){
				upPageHtml = '&lt;span class="showpage"&gt;&lt;a href="/"&gt;'+ upPageWord +'&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/span&gt;';
			}else{
				upPageHtml = '&lt;span class="showpage"&gt;&lt;a href="'+htmlMap[p]+'"&gt;'+ upPageWord +'&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/span&gt;';
			}
	
			fFlag++;
		}
	
		if(p==(thisNum-1)){
			html += '&lt;span class="showpagePoint"&gt;'+thisNum+'&lt;/span&gt;';
		}else{
			if(p==0){
					html += '&lt;span class="showpageNum"&gt;&lt;a href="/"&gt;1&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/span&gt;';

			}else{
				html += '&lt;span class="showpageNum"&gt;&lt;a href="'+htmlMap[p]+'"&gt;'+ (p+1) +'&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/span&gt;';
			}
		}
	
		if(eFlag ==0 &amp;&amp; p == thisNum){
			downPageHtml = '&lt;span class="showpage"&gt; &lt;a href="'+htmlMap[p]+'"&gt;'+ downPageWord +'&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/span&gt;';
			eFlag++;
		}
	}
}
	
if(thisNum&gt;1){
	html = ''+upPageHtml+' '+html +' ';
}
	
html = '&lt;div class="showpageArea"&gt;&lt;span style="COLOR: #000;" class="showpageOf"&gt; Pages ['+(postNum-1)+']&lt;/span&gt;'+html;
	
if(thisNum&lt;(postNum-1)){
	html += downPageHtml;	
}
	
if(postNum==1) postNum++;
html += '&lt;/div&gt;';
	

var pageArea = document.getElementsByName("pageArea");
var blogPager = document.getElementById("blog-pager");

if(postNum &lt;= 2){
	html ='';
}

for(var p =0;p&lt; pageArea.length;p++){
	pageArea[p].innerHTML = html;
}


if(pageArea&amp;&amp;pageArea.length&gt;0){
	html ='';
}

if(blogPager){
	blogPager.innerHTML = html;
}


}


function showpageCount2(json) {

var thisUrl = home_page_url;
var htmlMap = new Array();
var isLablePage = thisUrl.indexOf("/search/label/")!=-1;
var thisLable = isLablePage ? thisUrl.substr(thisUrl.indexOf("/search/label/")+14,thisUrl.length) : "";
thisLable = thisLable.indexOf("?")!=-1 ? thisLable.substr(0,thisLable.indexOf("?")) : thisLable;
var thisNum = 1;
var postNum=1;
var itemCount = 0;
var fFlag = 0;
var eFlag = 0;
var html= '';
var upPageHtml ='';
var downPageHtml ='';



var labelHtml = '&lt;span class="showpageNum"&gt;&lt;a href="/search/label/'+thisLable+'?&amp;max-results='+pageCount+'"&gt;';
var thisUrl = home_page_url;	

htmlMap[htmlMap.length]=labelHtml;
postNum++;

for(var i=pageCount-1, post; post = json.feed.entry[i]; i=i+pageCount) {
	var timestamp1 = post.published.$t.substring(0,19)+post.published.$t.substring(23,29);
	timestamp = encodeURIComponent(timestamp1);

	
	var title = post.title.$t;

			if(thisUrl.indexOf(timestamp)!=-1 ){
				thisNum = postNum;
			}
	
			if(title!='') postNum++;
			htmlMap[htmlMap.length] = '/search/label/'+thisLable+'?updated-max='+timestamp+'&amp;max-results='+pageCount;
				
	itemCount++;
}

var banyaknomer = htmlMap.length;
if (json.feed.entry.length % pageCount == 0){
	var banyaknomer = htmlMap.length -1 ;
	postNum=postNum-1;
};
	
for(var p =0;p&lt; banyaknomer;p++){
	if(p&gt;=(thisNum-displayPageNum-1) &amp;&amp; p&lt;(thisNum+displayPageNum)){
		if(fFlag ==0 &amp;&amp; p == thisNum-2){
			if(thisNum==2){
				upPageHtml = labelHtml + upPageWord +'&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/span&gt;';
			}else{
				upPageHtml = '&lt;span class="showpage"&gt;&lt;a href="'+htmlMap[p]+'"&gt;'+ upPageWord +'&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/span&gt;';
			}
	
			fFlag++;
		}
	
		if(p==(thisNum-1)){
			html += '&lt;span class="showpagePoint"&gt;'+thisNum+'&lt;/span&gt;';
		}else{
			if(p==0){
				html = labelHtml+'1&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/span&gt;';
			}else{
				html += '&lt;span class="showpageNum"&gt;&lt;a href="'+htmlMap[p]+'"&gt;'+ (p+1) +'&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/span&gt;';
			}
		}
	
		if(eFlag ==0 &amp;&amp; p == thisNum){
			downPageHtml = '&lt;span class="showpage"&gt; &lt;a href="'+htmlMap[p]+'"&gt;'+ downPageWord +'&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/span&gt;';
			eFlag++;
		}
	}
}
	
if(thisNum&gt;1){
	if(!isLablePage){
		html = ''+upPageHtml+' '+html +' ';
	}else{
		html = ''+upPageHtml+' '+html +' ';
	}
}
	
html = '&lt;div class="showpageArea"&gt;&lt;span style="COLOR: #000;" class="showpageOf"&gt; Pages ('+(postNum-1)+')&lt;/span&gt;'+html;
	
if(thisNum&lt;(postNum-1)){
	html += downPageHtml;	
}
	
if(postNum==1) postNum++;
html += '&lt;/div&gt;';
	
var pageArea = document.getElementsByName("pageArea");
var blogPager = document.getElementById("blog-pager");

if(postNum &lt;= 2){
	html ='';
}

for(var p =0;p&lt; pageArea.length;p++){
	pageArea[p].innerHTML = html;
}

if(pageArea&amp;&amp;pageArea.length&gt;0){
	html ='';
}

if(blogPager){
	blogPager.innerHTML = html;
}

}
         </script>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          var thisUrl = home_page_url;
	if (thisUrl.indexOf("/search/label/")!=-1){
		if (thisUrl.indexOf("?updated-max")!=-1){
			var lblname1 = thisUrl.substring(thisUrl.indexOf("/search/label/")+14,thisUrl.indexOf("?updated-max"));
		}else{
			var lblname1 = thisUrl.substring(thisUrl.indexOf("/search/label/")+14,thisUrl.indexOf("?&amp;max"));
		}
	}

	var home_page = "/";
	if (thisUrl.indexOf("?q=")==-1 &amp;&amp; thisUrl.indexOf(".html")==-1){	
		if (thisUrl.indexOf("/search/label/")==-1){			
			document.write('&lt;script src="'+home_page+'feeds/posts/summary?alt=json-in-script&amp;callback=showpageCount&amp;max-results=99999" &gt;&lt;\/script&gt;')
		}else{document.write('&lt;script src="'+home_page+'feeds/posts/full/-/'+lblname1+'?alt=json-in-script&amp;callback=showpageCount2&amp;max-results=99999" &gt;&lt;\/script&gt;')
		}
	}
         </script>
         <!-- page navigation end -->
        </span>
       </div>
       <span class="noprint">
        <div id="mainbottomleft">
         <div class="sidebar1 section" id="sidebar11">
         </div>
        </div>
        <div id="mainbottomright">
         <div class="sidebar1 section" id="sidebar12">
         </div>
        </div>
       </span>
      </div>
      <div id="sidebar-wrapper">
       <span class="noprint">
        <div class="sidebar section" id="sidebar">
         <div class="widget HTML" id="HTML17">
          <div class="widget-content">
           <table border="0" width="350">

           <style>
            #menump {
align:center;
}
#menump ul {
    list-style:none;
    padding:0;
    margin:0;
    overflow:hidden;
    font:0.875em/1 Arial, sans-serif;

}

#menump ul li {
    float:left;
    width:46px;
    height:49px;
padding-left: 20px;

}

#menump ul li a {
    display:block;
    width:45px;
    height:45px;
    overflow:hidden;
    border:1px solid transparent;
    line-height:45px;
    text-decoration:none;
    /* css3 */
    text-shadow:0 -1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
    -moz-border-radius:5px;
    -webkit-border-radius:5px;
    border-radius:5px; /* standards version last */
}

#menump ul li a:hover, #menump ul li a:focus, #menump ul li a:active {
    opacity:0.8;
    border-color:#000;
}


/* ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--  FACEBOOK
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ */

.facebook a {
    position:relative;
    border-color:#3c5a98;
    text-transform:lowercase;
    text-indent:24px;
    letter-spacing:10px;
    font-weight:bold;
    font-size:40px;
    line-height:50px;
    color:#fff;
    background:#3c5a98;

    /* css3 */
    -moz-box-shadow:0 0 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.4);
    -webkit-box-shadow:0 0 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.4);
    box-shadow:0 0 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.4); /* standards version last */
}

/* ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--  TWITTER
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ */

.twitter a {
    position:relative;
    border-color:#a8eaec;
    text-transform:lowercase;
    text-indent:13px;
    letter-spacing:40px;
    font:bold 45px/1 Tahoma, sans-serif;
    line-height:35px;
    color:#6ac6df;
    background:#daf6f7;

    /* css3 */
    text-shadow: 3px 3px 1px #fff, -3px -3px 1px #fff, 3px -3px 1px #fff, -3px 3px 1px #fff;
    -moz-box-shadow:0 0 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.4);
    -webkit-box-shadow:0 0 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.4);
    box-shadow:0 0 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.4); /* standards version last */
    /* NOTE: webkit gradient implementation is not as per spec */
    background:-webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, from(#dbf7f8), to(#88e1e6));
    background:-moz-linear-gradient(top, #dbf7f8, #88e1e6);
}

/* ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--  RSS
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ */

.rss a {
    position:relative;
    width:45px;
    padding:0 2px;
    border-color:#ea6635;
    text-transform:lowercase;
    text-indent:-186px;
    font-size:30px;
    font-weight:bold;
    color:#fff;
    background:#e36443;

    /* css3 */
    /* NOTE: box-shadow is not currently in any CSS3 module. It may be reappear in a different form altogether */
    -moz-box-shadow:0 0 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.4);
    -webkit-box-shadow:0 0 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.4);
    box-shadow:0 0 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.4); /* standards version last */
    /* NOTE: webkit gradient implementation is not as per spec */
    background:-webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, from(#f19242), to(#e36443));
    background:-moz-linear-gradient(top, #f19242, #e36443);
}

/* create circle */
.rss a:before {
    content:"\00a0";
    position:absolute;
    bottom:4px;
    left:5px;
    width:9px;
    height:9px;
    background:#fff;

    /* css3 */
    -moz-border-radius:12px;
    -webkit-border-radius:12px;
    border-radius:12px; /* standards version last */
}

/* create the two arcs */
.rss a:after {
    content:"\00a0";
    position:absolute;
    bottom:5px;
    left:5px;
    width:14px;
    height:13px;
    border-style:double;
    border-width:24px 24px 0 0;
    border-color:#fff;

    /* css3 */
    -moz-border-radius:0 50px 0 0;
    -webkit-border-top-right-radius:50px;
    border-radius:0 50px 0 0; /* standards version last */
}



/* ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--  GOOGLE
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ */

.google a {
    position:relative;
    border-color:#26478d;
    text-transform:lowercase;
    text-indent:6px;
    letter-spacing:40px;
    font: 71px/21px Georgia, Times New Roman, Times, serif;
    color:#fff;
    background:#1e3c7f;

    /* css3 */
    -moz-box-shadow:0 0 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.4);
    -webkit-box-shadow:0 0 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.4);
    box-shadow:0 0 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.4); /* standards version last */
    /* NOTE: webkit gradient implementation is not as per spec */
    background:-webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, from(#447aec), to(#1e3c7f));
    background:-moz-linear-gradient(top, #447aec, #1e3c7f);
}

}

font-weight: normal;
}

             <strong style="color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">
              POPULAR
             </strong>
             articles
            </h4>

              </li>
              <li class="dsq-widget-item odd" style="margin: 0px; padding: 10px; border-width: 0px 0px 1px; border-bottom-style: solid; border-bottom-color: rgb(241, 241, 241); font-style: inherit;  vertical-align: baseline; list-style: none; clear: both; position: relative;">
               <span style="margin: 0px 10px 0px 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-weight: 700; font-style: inherit; font-size: 1.8em; font-family: Georgia; vertical-align: middle; color: rgb(216, 216, 216); display: block; float: left; height: 25px; line-height: 25px; text-align: center; width: 25px; position: relative; top: -5px;">
                8
               </span>
               <a href="/2012/04/login-to-facebook-without-internet-from.html">
                <span style="color:#000000;">
                 Internet
                </span>
                Login Facebook Without Internet
               </a>
              </li>
              <li class="dsq-widget-item even" style="margin: 0px; padding: 10px; border-width: 0px 0px 1px; border-bottom-style: solid; border-bottom-color: rgb(241, 241, 241); font-style: inherit;  vertical-align: baseline; list-style: none; clear: both; position: relative; background-color: rgb(249, 249, 249);">
               <span style="margin: 0px 10px 0px 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-weight: 700; font-style: inherit; font-size: 1.8em; font-family: Georgia; vertical-align: middle; color: rgb(216, 216, 216); display: block; float: left; height: 25px; line-height: 25px; text-align: center; width: 25px; position: relative; top: -5px;">
                9
               </span>
               <a href="/2013/07/Star-Rating-Review.html">
                <span style="color:#000000;">
                 SEO
                </span>
                Star Rating Rich Snippet in Google Search
               </a>
              </li>
              <li class="dsq-widget-item odd" style="margin: 0px; padding: 10px; border-width: 0px 0px 1px; border-bottom-style: solid; border-bottom-color: rgb(241, 241, 241); font-style: inherit;  vertical-align: baseline; list-style: none; clear: both; position: relative;">
               <span style="margin: 0px 10px 0px 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-weight: 700; font-style: inherit; font-size: 1.8em; font-family: Georgia; vertical-align: middle; color: rgb(216, 216, 216); display: block; float: left; height: 25px; line-height: 25px; text-align: center; width: 25px; position: relative; top: -5px;">
                10
               </span>
               <a href="/2013/07/print-stylesheet-css-trick-for-blogger.html">
                <span style="color:#000000;">
                 Print
                </span>
                Stylesheet For Blogger 2013
               </a>
              </li>
             </ul>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="clear">
          </div>
          <span class="widget-item-control">
           <span class="item-control blog-admin">
            <a class="quickedit" href="//www.blogger.com/rearrange?blogID=4537507592189321213&amp;widgetType=HTML&amp;widgetId=HTML8&amp;action=editWidget&amp;sectionId=sidebar" onclick='return _WidgetManager._PopupConfig(document.getElementById("HTML8"));' target="configHTML8" title="Edit">
             <img alt="" height="18" src="//img1.blogblog.com/img/icon18_wrench_allbkg.png" width="18"/>

         <div class="widget HTML" id="HTML7">

                $("#toTop").scrollToTop();
            });
  </script>
